name: Favour Emeka
headline: Frontend Web Developer specializing in Vue.js, Nuxt.js and Typescript.
about: Frontend Web Developer specializing in Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and TypeScript, with experience in building scalable, AI-integrated web applications. Focused on creating performant solutions with clean, maintainable code and exceptional user experiences.

workExperience.description: Delivered high-quality web applications using Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and Typescript, ensuring exceptional user experiences and scalability with 100% client satisfaction.
